DataElement.preferredName: MicroRNA Specimen Testis Submission Yes No Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information as to whether microRNA specimens have been submitted for testis patients.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A sequence of single-stranded RNA, that is 20-25 nucleotides in length, which is transcribed from DNA but is not translated into a protein. This nucleic acid may regulate the transcription or translation of other genes._a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes._Either of the paired male reproductive glands that produce the male germ cells and the male hormones._Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.
